meanings.definition: The state of being patent or open
meanings.sent1: The patencies of the windows allowed fresh air to flow into the room.
meanings.sent2: The patencies of the gates made it easy for people to enter the park.
meanings.sent3: The patencies of the secret door were accidentally discovered by the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the patencies of a bright sunrise, welcoming and warm.
meanings.sent5: The patencies of the crystal-clear lake revealed the colorful fish swimming beneath the surface.

meanings.definition: The quality of being readily visible or understood
meanings.sent1: The patencies of his emotions were evident in his expressive eyes.
meanings.sent2: The patencies of the instructions made it easy for everyone to follow.
meanings.sent3: The patencies of the joke finally dawned on him, and he burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence shone through the patencies of her insightful comments.
meanings.sent5: The patencies of the map guided them safely through the unfamiliar terrain.
